title: Yet another Azir bug
body: Well I found a new bug with him, occasionally he tries to auto path to a random turret after summoning a sand solider and it is beyond annoying haha please fix our bird lord. It happens at random after w is cast{{item:3070}} {{champion:268}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: This is a [known issue](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_GB#euw). We're working on it! ^-^
It happens to me too. And also when I click a target to atk with the sand soldiers azir runs to a random spot. If I keep clicking the target or click and hold, he wont run.

Yup, they're working on it.
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en#na
oh cool. guess i'll just have to be careful until then
